data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in Sevilla.
In the minute 1, Sevilla pushes forward through Lucas Ocampos, whose finish on goal is saved.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a throw-in for Sevilla, close to Celta Vigo's area.
In Seville a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 2, Jesus Navas (Sevilla) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Sevilla in their own half.
Cesar Soto Grado awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 4, Sevilla's Youssef En-Nesyri gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Celta Vigo have a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Sevilla drives forward and Oliver Torres gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Sevilla have a dangerous throw-in.
Sevilla have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
Jules Kounde is on target to give Sevilla a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 7, Celta Vigo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Sevilla.
Lucas Ocampos of Sevilla smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 8, Sevilla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Celta Vigo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sevilla's half?
Celta Vigo to take a throw-in in Sevilla territory.
In the minute 10, Goal! Iago Aspas levels the match at 1-1.
Free kick for Sevilla in their own half.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sevilla.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a Sevilla throw-in in Celta Vigo's half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 21, Ball safe as Celta Vigo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sevilla awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sevilla awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 23, Goal kick for Celta Vigo at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
Throw-in Celta Vigo.
Celta Vigo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Sevilla in the half of Celta Vigo.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Sevilla in Seville.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Sevilla close to the penalty box.
Can Sevilla get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celta Vigo's half?
Free kick Celta Vigo.
In the minute 31, Ball safe as Sevilla is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in the half of Sevilla.
In the minute 33, Sevilla to take a throw-in in Celta Vigo territory.
Sergio Escudero is on a sub for Marcos Acuna for Sevilla.
Can Sevilla capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Celta Vigo's half?
Free kick in a good position for Sevilla!
In the minute 34, Celta Vigo needs to be cautious. Sevilla have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Nolito scores to make it 1-2 at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Sevilla in the half of Celta Vigo.
Cesar Soto Grado awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Sevilla at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Joseph Aidoo for Celta Vigo who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 42, Ball safe as Celta Vigo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It seems as if Joseph Aidoo is unable to continue. Nestor Araujo replaces him for the away team.
Celta Vigo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Sevilla in their own half.
Lucas Olaza is back on his feet again.
At Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Celta Vigo have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Seville.
In the minute 45, Lucas Olaza is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Youssef En-Nesyri equalizes with a header to make it 2-2.
Jesus Navas with an assist there.
The second-half is now underway.
Cesar Soto Grado awards the home team a throw-in.
Iago Aspas has recovered and rejoins the match in Seville.
Throw-in Sevilla.
In the minute 47, Play has been interrupted briefly in Seville to check on Iago Aspas, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Sevilla at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Seville.
Corner awarded to Celta Vigo.
In the minute 50, Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Sevilla.
Celta Vigo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Sevilla in their own half.
In the minute 54, Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Sevilla in their own half.
Celta Vigo's Denis Suarez has been booked in Seville.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a Sevilla throw-in in Celta Vigo's half.
In the minute 55, Celta Vigo to take a throw-in in Sevilla territory.
Sevilla awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan, Sevilla are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Sevilla close to the penalty box.
Sevilla have a dangerous throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 59, Can Sevilla capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Celta Vigo's half?
Joan Jordan of Sevilla gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Celta Vigo goal kick.
In the minute 61, Celta Vigo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sevilla.
Sevilla are pushing forward but Diego Carlos's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 62, Cesar Soto Grado awards Celta Vigo a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sevilla in the half of Celta Vigo.
Iago Aspas for Celta Vigo drives towards goal at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 65, Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Sevilla in their own half.
Santi Mina gets his shot on target but fails to score for Celta Vigo.
Celta Vigo's Renato Tapia misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 67, Sevilla have a goal kick.
Julen Lopetegui is making the team's third substitution at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan with Luuk De Jong replacing Youssef En-Nesyri.
The away team have replaced Nolito with Okay Yokuslu. This is the second substitution made today by Eduardo Coudet.
In the minute 68, The home team replace Oliver Torres with Munir El Haddadi.
Free kick for Sevilla in the half of Celta Vigo.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
In the minute 71, In Seville Celta Vigo attack through Hugo Mallo. The finish is off target, however.
Cesar Soto Grado awards Sevilla a goal kick.
Can Celta Vigo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sevilla's half?
Free kick Sevilla.
In the minute 72, Hugo Mallo for Celta Vigo has been booked by Cesar Soto Grado and receives a first yellow card.
In Seville a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 73, At Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan, Sergio Escudero has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Sevilla needs to be cautious. Celta Vigo have an attacking throw-in.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Sevilla in their own half.
In the minute 75, Throw-in Celta Vigo.
Sevilla drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Cesar Soto Grado awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 78, Can Sevilla capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Sevilla's Joan Jordan is on target but unsuccessful.
Ball goes out of play for a Celta Vigo goal kick.
In the minute 80, Free kick Sevilla.
In the minute 81, Cesar Soto Grado signals a Sevilla throw-in in Celta Vigo's half.
Oussama Idrissi is replacing Joan Jordan for Sevilla at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
Oscar is replacing Lucas Ocampos for the home team.
Ball safe as Celta Vigo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
In the minute 83, Sevilla awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sevilla's Luuk De Jong gets in a shot on goal at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Goal! Sergio Escudero gives Sevilla a 3-2 lead in Seville.
In the minute 87, Great finish from Munir El Haddadi to give Sevilla a 4-2 lead.
Celta Vigo make their third substitution with Miguel Rodriguez replacing Renato Tapia.
Throw-in for Sevilla in their own half.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Sevilla in the half of Celta Vigo.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Sevilla.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Celta Vigo are whistled for offside.
In Seville a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal kick for Sevilla at Ramon Sanchez Pizjuan.
Cesar Soto Grado blows to end the match. The final score is 4-2.
